content: the threefold blanket is made up of 35 squares 12 different designs arranged in a 5 x 7 format and finished with a 9 round border to give an approximate blanket size of 96 x 130 cm easily adaptable to be smaller or larger gauge is not critical but may affect yarn quantities squares are made individually and then joined together at the end - you can sew or crochet them together individual squares measure 16cm x 16cm
